text: @realDonaldTrump (1/2) But you didn't though you promised it in 2016. Look at the US right now: 13.3 percent unemployment rate, 109,143 people died because of the novel Coronavirus pandemic, Police brutality (especially towards African Americans) and riots in the recent days being out of control.
